sources.title: Shoein' Hosses (1934)
sources.description: Wimpy is such a terrible helper that blacksmith Olive fires him. Both Popeye and Bluto see the help wanted sign; they compete for the position. Of course, their competition wrecks the shop. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/shoein-hosses-1934/

metadata.Plot: Wimpy is such a terrible helper that blacksmith Olive fires him. Both Popeye and Bluto see the help wanted sign; they compete for the position. Of course, their competition wrecks the shop.
metadata.Actors: Charles Carver, William Costello, Charles Lawrence
